description: Officials say an eight-month-old baby was among those killed in flooding on the island of Evia.
title: Greece floods: At least five killed after Evia island storms
title_page: Greece floods: At least five killed after Evia island storms - BBC News
maintext: Hours earlier, a man and woman in their 80s were found unconscious in two separate houses. They were later pronounced dead in hospital, the fire service said. Two other unidentified bodies have been recovered by rescue workers.
